### Total Score Calculation

- Total Score = (0.33 + 0.67 + 0.67 + 0.33 + 0.33 + 0.67 + 1.0 + 1.0 + 0.33 + 0.33) / 10 = 2.333333

This detailed breakdown explains the reasoning behind each score and the overall alignment between the text prompt and the AI-generated image.
